text: Amir Hossein Amiri (); is an Iranian Football Midfielder who currently plays for Iranian football club Paykan in the Iran Pro League. ==Club career== ===Early years=== He joined Moghavemat Tehran U21 in 2012 and spent two season with them. He helped Moghavemat in 2013–14 Tehran Asia Vision U21 Premier League winning. ===Paykan=== Nemati joined Paykan in summer 2014.http://cup.ir/sport/iranianfootball/487/%D9%81%D9%88%D8%AA%D8%A8%D8%A7%D9%84-%D9%BE%D8%A7%DB%8C%D9%87%DA%86%D9%87%D8%A7%D8%B1-%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%B2%DB%8C%DA%A9%D9%86-%D8%A7%D9%85%DB%8C%D8%AF%D9%87%D8%A7%DB%8C-%D9%BE%DB%8C%DA%A9%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%A8%D9%87-%D8%AA%DB%8C%D9%85-%D8%A8%D8%B2%D8%B1%DA%AF%D8%B3%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%A7%D9%86-%D9%BE%DB%8C%D9%88%D8%B3%D8%AA%D9%86%D8%AF/16585 he made his debut for Paykan as September 26, 2014 against Padideh as a substitute for Muamer Svraka. ==Club career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Hazfi Cup !colspan="2"|Asia !colspan="2"|Total |- !
